Package controller

Class PhotoViewController

java.lang.Object
controller.PhotoViewController
public class PhotoViewController
extends java.lang.Object
The Photo Controller allows user to view the enlarged photo helps add/remove tags and displays details relevant to photo.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    PhotoViewController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void handleAddTagButton()
    Handles add tag button and enables to text fields and buttons.
    void handleBackButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    Handles the back button and takes the current user to display album scene.
    void handleCancelTagButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    Handles the cancel button, confirms with user if user wants to cancel the action and clears the fields and dissables the buttons.
    void handleConfirmButton()
    Handles the confirm button and after checking if the tag doesn't exist, it adds the new tag and saves the users data.
    void handleDeleteTagButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    Handles the delete button and deletes the selected tag.
    void handleLogoutButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    At any given point the user can logout and it will take user to the main login screen.
    void handleSwitchButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
    Handles the switch photo buttons to change the photos.
    void start​(java.util.ArrayList<User> users, javafx.scene.control.ListView<Photo> photos, User user, Album selectedAlbum)
    On Start the list of users, list of photos, current user and selected album is initialized.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start​(java.util.ArrayList<User> users, javafx.scene.control.ListView<Photo> photos, User user, Album selectedAlbum)
      On Start the list of users, list of photos, current user and selected album is initialized. Also information related to photo is set to the fields.
      Parameters:
      users - takes the list of users
      photos - takes the list of photos
      user - current user
      selectedAlbum - current album

    • handleSwitchButton

      public void handleSwitchButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the switch photo buttons to change the photos.
      Parameters:
      event - takes the mouse event.

    • handleAddTagButton

      public void handleAddTagButton()
      Handles add tag button and enables to text fields and buttons.

    • handleDeleteTagButton

      public void handleDeleteTagButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the delete button and deletes the selected tag. Saves the users data.
      Parameters:
      event - takes the mouse event.

    • handleConfirmButton

      public void handleConfirmButton()
      Handles the confirm button and after checking if the tag doesn't exist, it adds the new tag and saves the users data.

    • handleCancelTagButton

      public void handleCancelTagButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the cancel button, confirms with user if user wants to cancel the action and clears the fields and dissables the buttons.
      Parameters:
      event - takes the mouse click event.

    • handleBackButton

      public void handleBackButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the back button and takes the current user to display album scene.
      Parameters:
      event - takes the mouse click event.

    • handleLogoutButton

      public void handleLogoutButton​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      At any given point the user can logout and it will take user to the main login screen.
      Parameters:
      event - takes the mouse event.
